abstract: Editorial suggests, before succumbing to aggravation in the airport security line, consider the latest tally of weapons, more than 800 this year, confiscated from carry-on luggage across the nation.
snippet: The next time you’re aggravated in an airport security line, you might consider all the weapons confiscated from carry-on luggage so far this year.
lead_paragraph: The next time you’re aggravated in an airport security line, you might consider all the weapons confiscated from carry-on luggage so far this year.
